name: Race (itch) (Fescetor)
description:
Hey guys! Fescetor here . This game is completely based on a tutorial by Imphenzia on youtube. Made some extra content like the UI's And car selection, night mode, and stuff. this is my second game and so might have a lot of bugs. Hope you enjoy it!

P.S. You cant cheat your way by taking a shortcut. You must pass through all the turns.
